weeks.topic: Week 1 Introduction: Algorithms, Pseudo code for expressing algorithms.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing Algorithms, Pseudo code for expressing algorithms.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week 2 Performance analysis- Space complexity, Time Complexity, Asymptotic notation- Big oh notation, omega notation, theta notation and little oh notation.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing Week 2 Performance analysis- Space complexity, Time Complexity, Asymptotic notation- Big oh notation, omega notation, theta notation and little oh notation.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week 3 Divide and Conquer: General method. Applications- Binary search, Quick sort, merge sort, Strassen’s matrix multiplication.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing General method. Applications- Binary search, Quick sort, merge sort, Strassen’s matrix multiplication.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week 4 Disjoint set operations, Union and Find algorithms, AND/OR graphs, Connected components, Bi-connected components.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing Week 4 Disjoint set operations, Union and Find algorithms, AND/OR graphs, Connected components, Bi-connected components.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.
recommended_books: Computing Biconnected Components on a Hypercube

weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing Week 5 CAT 1. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week 6 Greedy method: General method, applications- Job sequencing with deadlines, Knapsack problem, Spanning trees, Minimum cost spanning trees, Single source shortest path problem.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing General method, applications- Job sequencing with deadlines, Knapsack problem, Spanning trees, Minimum cost spanning trees, Single source shortest path problem.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week 7 Dynamic Programming: General method, applications- Matrix chained multiplication, Optimal binary search trees, 0/1 Knapsack problem.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing General method, applications- Matrix chained multiplication, Optimal binary search trees, 0/1 Knapsack problem.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week 8 All pairs shortest path problem, Traveling sales person problem, Reliability design.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing Week 8 All pairs shortest path problem, Traveling sales person problem, Reliability design.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.
Focus on understanding and practicing Week 9 CAT 2. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.
recommended_books: 180 Days: Spelling and Word Study for Kindergarten

weeks.topic: Week 10 Backtracking: General method, Applications- n-queue problem, Sum of subsets problem, Graph coloring, Hamiltonian cycles.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing General method, Applications- n-queue problem, Sum of subsets problem, Graph coloring, Hamiltonian cycles.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week11 Branch and Bound: General method, applications- Travelling sales person problem, 0/1 Knapsack problem- LC branch and Bound solution, FIFO branch and Bound solution.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing General method, applications- Travelling sales person problem, 0/1 Knapsack problem- LC branch and Bound solution, FIFO branch and Bound solution.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.

weeks.topic: Week 12 NP-Hard and NP-Complete Problems: Basic concepts, Non deterministic algorithms, NP-Hard and NPComplete classes, NP-Hard problems, Cook’s theorem.
weeks.study_plan: Focus on understanding and practicing Basic concepts, Non deterministic algorithms, NP-Hard and NPComplete classes, NP-Hard problems, Cook’s theorem.. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.
Focus on understanding and practicing Week 13 EXAMS. Review examples, read at least one recommended book, and watch the videos to reinforce key concepts.
